post:
Heya

We just launched a OVHcloud / So you Start Summer Deals !

Till 21st July
https://www.ovh.ie/deals/
https://www.ovh.com/world/deals/

----------------------------------------------------------------

**OVH offers**

**Special edition server (= recurring pricing).
No setup fees**

https://www.ovh.ie/dedicated_servers/rise/prices/
https://www.ovh.com/world/dedicated-servers/rise/prices/

**Rise-LE-1**

Intel Xeon E3-1230v6 - 4 c/8 t
3,50 GHz/3,90 GHz
2 x 4 TB HDD SATA Soft RAID
16 GB DDR3 ECC 2133 MHz
500 Mbps BW
**49.99€ excl-VAT**

Available in FR / CA datacenters

**Rise-LE-2**

Intel Xeon E5-1630v3/v4 - 4 c/8 t
3,70 GHz/3,80 GHz
2 x 6 TB HDD SATA Soft RAID
32 GB DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz
500 Mbps BW
**59.99€ excl-VAT**

Available in FR / CA(soon) datacenters

**Rise-LE-3**

2 x Intel Xeon E5-2620v3 - 12 c/24 t
2,40 GHz/3,20 GHz
2 x 4 TB HDD SATA Soft RAID
128 GB DDR4 ECC 1866 MHz
500 Mbps BW
**104.99€ excl-VAT**

Available in FR / CA datacenters


**+ Public Cloud (free trial 100€) + Webhosting + domains offers**
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

20€ setup fees / No setup fees if 6/12 months commitment**

Cheers

Ninzo
